function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate design for climate change adaptation in built environments","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to adverse effects of climate change, such as warmer temperatures, drought, storms, flooding, and power interruptions","Mitigation":"Implementation of adaptive strategies to prepare buildings against climate change impacts","Technologies":"Climate-resilient building materials, green infrastructure, sustainable design practices","People":"Building occupants, communities in at-risk areas","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building designers"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease propagation in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread within built environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of measures to reduce airborne transmission, improve ventilation, and promote hygiene practices","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection, smart ventilation systems, touchless fixtures","People":"Building occupants, visitors, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"}]}
